channel.title: Working Ipban Code.-508-

item.title: Working Ipban Code.-508-
item.dc:creator: @B_A_R_A_G_Ez B A R A G Ez™
item.description:
@B_A_R_A_G_Ez wrote:

Umm, earlyer i tryed too ipban someone it didint work.

They seem too log back in, & The Ipban only works for several minutes.

Heres, my ipban code.

if (cmd[0].equals("ipban") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("Account")) { String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)]; String host = Server.socketListener.getAddress(p2.socket.socket) ; if (p2 != null || p2.rights < 2) { p2.getActionSender().logout(p2); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "The player " + p2.username + " has been ipbanned."); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "No more connections may come from " +host); p2.ipBanned(host); BufferedWriter bw = null; p.updateReq = true; p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; SocketListener.loadBannedHosts(); } }

It Don’t work, Does anyone know a working ipban command?

Read full topic
